user.title: Evolution API Configuration
user.description:
Enter your Evolution API connection details. You can find these in your Evolution API dashboard.

[Evolution API Documentation]({docs_url})

data_description.server_url: The base URL of your Evolution API server (e.g., https://your-server.com)
data_description.instance_id: The unique identifier for your WhatsApp instance
data_description.verify_ssl: Enable SSL certificate verification (recommended for production)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the Evolution API server. Please check the server URL.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid API key. Please check your credentials.
error.instance_not_connected: The WhatsApp instance is not connected. Please scan the QR code in Evolution API dashboard.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This Evolution API instance is already configured.

send_text.name: Send Text Message
send_text.description: Send a text message via WhatsApp.

phone_number.name: Phone Number

delay.name: Delay
delay.description: Delay in milliseconds before sending the message

link_preview.name: Link Preview
link_preview.description: Show link preview if the message contains a URL

mention_all.name: Mention All
mention_all.description: Mention everyone in the group (only works in groups)

send_media.name: Send Media
send_media.description: Send an image, video, or document via WhatsApp.

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: The recipient's phone number with country code

media_url.name: Media URL
media_url.description: URL or base64 encoded media content

media_type.name: Media Type
media_type.description: Type of media: image, video, or document

filename.name: Filename
filename.description: Filename for the media (especially for documents)

send_audio.name: Send Audio
send_audio.description: Send an audio message (voice note) via WhatsApp.

phone_number.description: The recipient's phone number with country code

audio_url.name: Audio URL
audio_url.description: URL or base64 encoded audio content

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: The recipient's phone number with country code

sticker_url.name: Sticker URL
sticker_url.description: URL or base64 encoded sticker (WebP format recommended)

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: The recipient's phone number with country code

send_contact.name: Send Contact
send_contact.description: Send a contact card via WhatsApp.

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: The recipient's phone number with country code

send_reaction.name: Send Reaction
send_reaction.description: Send a reaction to a message.

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: The phone number of the chat

message_id.name: Message ID
message_id.description: The ID of the message to react to

reaction.name: Reaction
reaction.description: The emoji reaction to send (empty string to remove)

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: The recipient's phone number with country code

poll_name.name: Poll Name
poll_name.description: The question or title of the poll

max_selections.name: Max Selections
max_selections.description: Maximum number of options a user can select

check_number.name: Check WhatsApp Number
check_number.description: Check if a phone number is registered on WhatsApp.

phone_number.name: Phone Number
phone_number.description: The phone number to check (with country code)

refresh_groups.name: Refresh Groups List
